Package SampleScale

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gmxhome.conrad.jpos.jpos_base.JposBaseDevice
      • de.gmxhome.conrad.jpos.jpos_base.JposDevice
        • SampleScale.Device
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Device
extends JposDevice
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Implementation of a JposDevice based implementation of a scales driver that becomes a JavaPOS Scales service in combination with the JposScale class

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Device.SampleScaleAccessor
      The sample scale interface implementation class.

    • Field Detail

      • Target

        UniqueIOProcessor Target
        IO processor to be used for communication with scale.

      • MaxRetry

        int MaxRetry
        Maximum no. of retries before service gives up communication.

      • OwnPort

        java.lang.Integer OwnPort
        In case of a TCP connection, values above 0 specify the source port number. Zero results in an random source port.

      • RequestTimeout

        int RequestTimeout
        Timeout for getting a response after sending a request.

      • CharacterTimeout

        int CharacterTimeout
        Timeout for getting the next character of a multi-character frame.

      • PollDelay

        int PollDelay
        Delay between unforced status requests used to verify operational state of the scale.

      • MaximumWeight

        int MaximumWeight
        Maximum weight supported by the scale. Any higher weight results in an overweight condition.

      • DefaultTara

        int DefaultTara
        Default tare value. If the scale shall use any other default, you can set it here.

      • WeightUnit

        int WeightUnit
        Weight unit of the scale. Currently, only supported value is SCAL_WU_KILOGRAM.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Device

        protected Device​(java.lang.String id)
        Constructor. id specifies either the COM port to be used or the server to be connected in format host:port
        Parameters:
        id - COM port or IP target address and port
